about.campaign: This trans-led digital campaign organized by <Link1>InReach</Link1> and <Link2>GLAAD</Link2> aims to showcase positive stories from the diverse trans masculine community and increase access to safe, verified resources through the <Link3>free InReach App</Link3>.
about.hollister: <Title>And special thanks to <Link>The Hollister Confidence Fund</Link> for their support.</Title>

stats.stat1-text: of trans men and trans masculine youth have considered suicide
stats.stat2-text: transgender and nonbinary youth have attempted suicide.
stats.stat3-text: of the U.S. trans population identify as trans men.

about.trans-people: Trans people are everywhere. This campaign includes stories from trans men and trans masculine adults across the country.

act.card1:
<Title>Participate in this campaign</Title>
<Text>We're currently accepting submissions from trans men and trans masculine adults in the U.S. to share their story.</Text>
<Text>Click <Link>here</Link> to participate.</Text>
act.card2:
<Title>Help increase resource access for the diverse trans masculine community</Title>
<Text>InReach is always looking for new resource suggestions to help expand our free app. Know an organization that is affirming and safe for trans masculine people?</Text>
<Text>You can suggest a resource to be listed on the free InReach App <Link>here</Link>.</Text>
act.card3:
<Title>Access affirming resources, 24/7</Title>
<Text>Use the free InReach App to access safe, independently verified legal, medical, mental health and social services near you. <Link>Click here</Link> to find resources. Stay tuned for our new trans men and trans masculine community 'sort by' filter coming soon!</Text>

errors.consent-all-3: You must consent to all three.
errors.min-21: You must be at least 21 years old to participate.
errors.verify-all-3: You must verify that all three are true.

main-page.tagline1: Trans men and trans masculine adults share their stories of trans joy.

nav.switch-lang: Haz clic aquí para cambiar a español.

share.list2: PDF document with sample sharing language
share.subtitle: For your sharing convenience:
share.title: Use our #TransMascFutures social media toolkit.

story.prompt1: The first moment I could see my future as a trans man or trans masculine person was...

survey-form.eligiblity:
<Text>Participant eligiblity critera:</Text>
<List><ListItem>You are a trans man or a trans masculine person</ListItem>
<ListItem>You are 21 years old or over</ListItem>
<ListItem>You are currently living anywhere in the United States</ListItem></List>
survey-form.intro: InReach is partnering with GLAAD to organize #TransMascFutures. This trans-led digital campaign aims to showcase positive stories from the diverse trans masculine community and increase access to safe, verified resources through the InReach App. The #TransMascFutures Campaign launched on June 7th, 2023. Submit this form to add your story to the campaign website.
survey-form.q1: You verify that the following is true (check all that apply):

q1-opts.00_transmasc: I am a trans man or trans masculine person
q1-opts.01_over21: I am at least 21 years old
q1-opts.02_us: I currently live in the United States

survey-form.q10:
Which gender-related terms best describe your personal identity?
(Select all that apply.)
survey-form.q11:
Select how you describe your sexual orientation.
(Select all that apply.)
survey-form.q12:
Select how you identify your race/ethnicity.
(Select all that apply.)
survey-form.q13: Select which U.S. region you live in.
survey-form.q14: Select which U.S. state you live in.
survey-form.q15:
Do you identify as any of the following?
(Select all that apply.)

q15-opts.06_none: I do not identify as any of these

survey-form.q2: I consent to having my submission shared by InReach via
survey-form.q3: Please provide your email address if you would like to stay updated on the status of the #TransMascFutures Campaign.
survey-form.q4:
Please enter your name as you would like it to appear on the campaign website.
(Only a first name will be displayed. Aliases are welcome.)
survey-form.q5:
I identify as:
(Please select all that apply to you)

q5-opts.02_queer: Queer (i.e., identify your sexual orientation as something other than heterosexual)
q5-opts.03_elder: Elder (i.e., came out or transitioned before the year 2000)
q5-opts.05_immigrant: Immigrant (i.e., asylum seeker, asylee, resettled refugee, DACA recipient, etc.)

survey-form.q8: Describe the first moment you could see your future as a trans man or trans masculine person.
survey-form.q9:
What resources have helped you see your future as a trans man or trans masculine adult?
*Note: To maximize safety, please refrain from sharing personally identifying information, such as naming specific doctors or small clinics.
survey-form.section2: This section will ask you questions about yourself and your experiences. Please limit your responses to each question to 250 words or less.
survey-form.section3: This section helps to ensure diversity within our responses to represent the range of differences in trans masculine experiences.
survey-form.switch-lang: Haz clic aquí para la versión en español de la encuesta.
survey-form.thank-you:
Thank you for sharing your story!
Assuming your submission meets our participant eligibility criteria, we will add your story to our campaign website shortly. In the meantime, be sure to follow @weareinreach on social media for updates and download our campaign social media toolkit to share the campaign.

If you have any questions, please email marketing@inreach.org.
